ygData.subject: Re: Gazamel
ygData.msgSnippet: WARNING: This has nothing to do with tinkering... and since this is the first time I ve spoken out since I last tried to speak out and give the formula for the
ygData.messageBody:
WARNING:

This has nothing to do with tinkering... and since this is the first time
I've spoken out since I last tried to speak out and give the formula for the
tinkering spellcap I need to speak out on Gazamel's behalf....Gazamel has
been a great help in doing things and trying things that the only Lvl 50
gnome warrior could I believe she found the diamond and was willing to have
one of the ogres crush it .. knowing she might lose it... and she eventually
did. (and there could be another lvl 50 gnome warrior by now. I to am on the
solusek ro server with a lvl 30 enchanter a lvl 22 rogue and a lvl 21 druid.
Muldoon is quite the deciever and since I promised not to post again after
being flamed to death I apologize for the post that I am making no as it has
nothing to do with actual tinkering.

Currently playing Abunia Matadore
Rogue of 22 Solusek Ro.
